tool.name: Minfi qc
tool.description: provides a simple quality control matrix and plot

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE)
MSet <- get(load('$MethylSet'))
qc <- getQC(MSet)
write.table(qc, '$qctab')
png('$qcpng') plotQC(qc) dev.off()

param.name: MethylSet
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help: Quality Control (QC) outputs plot of the log median intensity in both the methylated (M) and unmethylated (U) channels. When plotting these two medians against each other the good samples cluster together, while failed samples tend to separate and have lower median intensities.
